Chohan ZH and
Hanif M . ( 2011). Synthesis and characterization of biologically active new Schiff bases containing 3‐functionalized 1,2,4‐triazoles and their zinc(II) complexes: crystal structure of 4‐bromo‐2‐[(E) ‐(1H‐1,2,4‐triazol‐3‐ylimino)‐ methyl]phenol. Applied Organometallic Chemistry 25( 10): 753– 760. 10.1002/aoc.1833
